segments.text: I see the woman, completely engrossed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is relaxed, almost serene, despite the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't comprehend how she hasn't noticed the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of running water must be quite audible, even if she's focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit angry that she's so utterly unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are performing a dangerous balancing act behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip at any moment, and they could both fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This lack of situational awareness is truly mind-boggling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is completely missing all the red flags in her own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the consequences if the boy falls onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to get her attention before something serious happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange bubble of obliviousness she exists in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene is a powder keg waiting for a spark.
segments.speaker: PAR
